page.title: 18A SURVEY OF 1ST YEAR PUPILS
page.content: A survey was conducted among first year pupils at Hassenbrook Comprehensive School. Most pupils enjoyed the lessons. Movement between classrooms was popular. Only a few pupils disliked this. A majority of pupils liked the work they did at school and a few said they would like more. Many children thought the buildings were large and they did get lost a lot in the first weeks at their new school. The large size of the playground was seen as a good thing but the number of seats available was too small.
